channel.name: SA-1a_ValidationChannel
channel.description:
This channel is the validation channel for Semantic Adapater.
It performs the following validations with the CaCISRequest message from the Semantic Adapter service,
1) performs xsd validation of the CaCISRequest 2) performs the siteid and patientid validation of the ClinicalMetadata 3) performs xsd validation of the SourceData element of the CaCISRequest 4) performs schematron validation of the SourceData element of the CaCISRequest

step.name: xsdValidate_CaCISRequest
validateClinicalMetadata
validateSourceData

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
